rev.comment: + info about file format of the backup files
rev.diff:
Line 28: Line 28:
Nokia ovi suite is a computer program available for Microsoft Windows that allows nokia users to backup the contents of their phones to the PC (in .nbu format), install maps on the phone, [[tethering]] (act as a modem to connect the computer to the Internet), updating the phone software, among other things. It is expected to be the replacement of [[Nokia PC Suite]] and is integrated with the [[Ovi (Nokia)|"ovi"]] brand of services.
Nokia ovi suite is a computer program available for Microsoft Windows that allows nokia users to backup the contents of their phones to the PC (in .nbu format), install maps on the phone, [[tethering]] (act as a modem to connect the computer to the Internet), updating the phone software, among other things. It is expected to be the replacement of [[Nokia PC Suite]] and is integrated with the [[Ovi (Nokia)|"ovi"]] brand of services.
  +   +
==Phone backup==
  +
Nokia ovi suite can perform a complete backup of the phone contents to a single file. This file uses the .nbu file extension, and this file format does not appear to be open/documented. The only official way to gain access to the contents of the backup is to restore it to the phone using nokia ovi suite, however, there are third-party programs that can read this files, like [http://sourceforge.net/projects/nbuexplorer/ NBU Explorer] and [[noki]].
